product_name: Lorpen Walking CoolMax FX Socks - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Lorpen Walking CoolMax FX socks for women offer everyday comfort with an antibacterial fabric that keeps feet cool and wards off unpleasant odors. CoolMax(R) Fresh FX(R) blend fabric keeps feet feeling fresh and dry; a touch of silk provides softness and comfort. Partial cushioning adds comfort. Closeout.
short_description: The Lorpen Walking CoolMax FX socks for women offer everyday comfort with an antibacterial fabric that keeps feet cool and wards off unpleasant odors.
